about_the_game:
Dongeng Bayang Kulit is a turn-based RPG that is loosely based on Southeast Asian folklore. Join the recently ship-less, Captain N'man and his mystical guide, Putri Matami as they travel in search for answers regarding a mysterious apparition that has taken to incessantly haunting N'man. What grudge does the spirit haunting N'man hold? What will it take to free N'man of this curse? You'll have to play to find out! We hope you have a great experience with it!

This demo contains the first chapter of the game which sees Captain N'man and Putri Matami investigate a long abandoned water village in search of clues about the spirit that is haunting the Captain.

Gameplay features:
  • Narrative-free, yet detailed story - Rich story and lore buried in any and all items you are able to pick up. Put it aside, or delve deep into it at your leisure! Heavily inspired by local Southeast Asian folk tales.
  • Simple, yet brutal combat - Set up your abilities, plan the most efficient way to overcome those who would dare stand in your way! Or fail and be punished heavily.. What cannot act, cannot hurt you!
  • Traditional themed score - A score that focuses on traditional brass percussions, ethnic guitars, and local drums - but used in a modern way that's almost inadvisable!
  • Parallax mapped environments - Hand-drawn maps that allows for more organic and atmospheric areas.

short_description: DBK is a turn-based RPG loosely based on Southeast Asian folklore. Join Captain N'man and Putri Matami as they travel in search of answers in this classic JRPG that features a narrative-free (yet detailed) story, hand-drawn environments, brutal combat, and a traditional score!
